talksYaml.title: Exploring Movie Actor Networks in Python
talksYaml.description: This talk explores popular network clustering algorithms (using the scikit-network and networkx Python libraries) on real-world movie datasets -- and shows how to find the path between two actors (via costars), how Iranian and Turkish actors are far removed from Hollywood but close to each other, and the one major film industry that is far away from the rest of the world.
